name: InfiniQuake
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 49 with TetaBester

You're in a building that's unstable and is experiencing an earthquake. You decide to take cover under something but, too late! Debris starts falling on you! You must survive for as long as you can by dodging the debris.

Made using GameMaker Studio 2

Controls

Arrow Keys to move
Space to jump

Team

Code by BigManCloudy
Music by TetaBester. Check out his Newgrounds!
All art by BigManCloudy except the player sprite which you can check out here
